name: Niraj Patel
text: This location provides excellent service. The waiters and waitresses are very caring to their customers. I've been to this location so many times and I've never been disappointed. The Wed buffet is excellent!

name: Rob Fetterhoff
text: This is a great Pizza Hut.  Nicest staff and great pizza! Dining area is always clean!

name: Dan Jones
text: Food is fine - I always just take out a pizza. The location is a bit hard to get too - legally you cannot turn left if your are heading north on Niagara Falls Boulevard (also it's quite dangerous going though 3 lanes of oncoming traffic). â€¦More

name: Shenna Robinson
text: Worst pizza hut I've ever visited. The employees are unprofessional. My food was over cooked and dining room is filthy.

name: Gregory Hoerner
text: Waitress was very friendly. Buffet wasn't stocked so well, there was just enough for us to eat.

name: Adam McIntyre
text: It's a Pizza Hut. It gets the job done.

name: Gray Snake
text: Went there for the lunch buffet

name: Matthew DiNatale
text: Run down! Parking lot is in terible condition building is dirty and old
